dublin_core.dcvalue: The use of telemedicine appears particularly promising in cardiovascular diseases it may reduce the decisional time during an acute myocardial infarction which is the greater part of the so called avoidable delay and the inappropriate admission to the Emergency Department with the possibility of ruling out an acute pathology The aim of our study was to show the diagnostic accuracy of a telecardiology service in the daily activity of general practitioners
Italian heart journal. Supplement : official journal of the Italian Federation of Cardiology
[Appropriateness of referral to the emergency department through a telecardiology service. "Boario Home-Care" researchers].
